name: MARK OF OXIN 2 DEMO
description:
current project description go : Mark Of Oxin 2 is the sequel to Phil Lester's RPG of the same name, Mark Of Oxin. The game (this one) was made in RPG Maker 2000 over the course of 1 summer, and is intentionally iffy with spelling and grammar mistakes to mimic the style of the original game. This game follows the stories of Emily + Jake, and a group of new characters across the lands of INSERT NAME HERE as they attempt to ascend the Tower of Babel.

Meet new characters and new antagonists in the already fierce battle against the armies of Satan and the newly bethroned Alex in a game that may or may not even be canon.

there's totally not any secrets and the game is totally only like 2 hours long and there's definitely not more than one ending
